db.juhaku.juhakudb.core.android

Class EntityConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.juhaku.juhakudb.core.android.EntityConverter

  • public class EntityConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by juha on 13/04/16.

    This class provides conversion between entities and database tables.

    Since:
    1.0.2

    • Method Detail

      • convertCursorToEntityList

        public <T> java.util.List<T> convertCursorToEntityList(Cursor cursor,
                                                       Root<?> root)
                                                throws ConversionException
        Convert cursor of SQL query result to list of entities. Root stands for root of SQL query containing joins to other tables if defined.

        Entities are converted distinctly for root entity.

        Parameters:
        cursor - Cursor containing SQL query result.
        root - Root of SQL query.
        Returns:
        List of converted entities from cursor's returned rows.
        Throws:
        ConversionException - if any exception occurs during conversion.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • instantiateByDefaultConstructor

        public static <T> T instantiateByDefaultConstructor(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Initialize new instance of class. Class must have default constructor available. If no default constructor is provided initialization will fail and conversion will stop.
        Parameters:
        type - Class to instantiate.
        Returns:
        Newly created instance of provided class.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • convertCursorToCustomResultSetList

        public java.util.List<ResultSet> convertCursorToCustomResultSetList(Cursor cursor)
                                                             throws ConversionException
        Throws:
        ConversionException

      • cursorToCustomResultSet

        public ResultSet cursorToCustomResultSet(Cursor cursor)
                                  throws ConversionException
        Throws:
        ConversionException

      • entityToContentValues

        public ContentValues entityToContentValues(java.lang.Object object)
                                    throws ConversionException
        Converts entity to content values. ContentValues is used when entity is stored to database. And in the content values is put column name and and value which will be stored.
        Parameters:
        object - The entity that is being stored to database.
        Returns:
        instance of ContentValues that are used to store entity to database.
        Throws:
        ConversionException - if any exception occurs during conversion.
        Since:
        1.0.2
